baseTbl.selectMonth as testDate
baseTbl.selectYear as testDate
,sum(totalCount) as totalTestCount ,sum(fair) as totalFairQualityCount ,sum(fault) as totalFaultCount from ( select DATENAME(YYYY, dateTime) +'년 '+ DATENAME(MM, datetime) +'월 '+ DATENAME(DD, datetime) + '일' AS selectDay ,DATENAME(yyyy, dateTime)+ '년 ' + DATENAME(ww, dateTime) + '주' AS selectWeek ,DATENAME(yyyy, dateTime)+ '년 ' + DATENAME(MM, dateTime) + '월' AS selectMonth ,DATENAME(yyyy, dateTime)+ '년 ' AS selectYear ,fairQualityCount as fair ,faultCount as fault ,fairQualityCount + faultCount as totalCount from OG_TestReport where 1=1

) baseTbl
